languages.text: "Участь павших членов Ордоса — дело самого Ордоса. Еретические архивы, артефакты, добытые во время раскопок, и прочее достояние Лихтенхарт я также объявляю собственностью Святой Инквизиции. Однако судьба людей Фтона-IV, как и самой планеты — в руках Вольного Торговца. Каков вердикт о судьбе местных обитателей?"

"The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"
languages.original_text: "Участь павших членов Ордоса — дело самого Ордоса. Еретические архивы, артефакты, добытые во время раскопок, и прочее достояние Лихтенхарт я также объявляю собственностью Святой Инквизиции. Однако судьба людей Фтона-IV, как и самой планеты — в руках Вольного Торговца. Каков вердикт о судьбе местных обитателей?"

However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"

traits.locale_text: "The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我在此宣布，这位堕落成员的命运，将由审判庭来决定。所有的异端档案、在发掘过程中得到的文物，以及莱肯哈特所拥有的其他资产，都将归审判庭所有。然而，菲顿四号星与这颗行星人民的命运，将由行商浪人决定。你打算如何裁决？”
languages.original_text: "The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"

traits.locale_text: “我在此宣布，这位堕落成员的命运，将由审判庭来决定。所有的异端档案、在发掘过程中得到的文物，以及莱肯哈特所拥有的其他资产，都将归审判庭所有。然而，菲顿四号星与这颗行星人民的命运，将由行商浪人决定。你打算如何裁决？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «El destino de sus miembros caídos es asunto de los Ordos. Los archivos heréticos, los artefactos obtenidos en la excavación y los demás recursos en posesión de Lichtenhart quedan requisados por la Santa Inquisición. No obstante, corresponde a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente decidir qué será de Phton IV y su gente. ¿Cuál es su veredicto?».
languages.original_text: "The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"

traits.locale_text: «El destino de sus miembros caídos es asunto de los Ordos. Los archivos heréticos, los artefactos obtenidos en la excavación y los demás recursos en posesión de Lichtenhart quedan requisados por la Santa Inquisición. No obstante, corresponde a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente decidir qué será de Phton IV y su gente. ¿Cuál es su veredicto?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「堕ちたメンバーの運命は、聖なる宗団の問題です。異端のアーカイブ、発掘で得られたアーティファクト、およびリヒテンハルトが所有するその他の資産は、聖なる異端審問庁の所有物であることをここに宣言します。しかし、プトン・IVとその人々がどうなるかを決めるのは自由開拓者です。審判は、いかがなさいますか？」
languages.original_text: "The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"

traits.locale_text: 「堕ちたメンバーの運命は、聖なる宗団の問題です。異端のアーカイブ、発掘で得られたアーティファクト、およびリヒテンハルトが所有するその他の資産は、聖なる異端審問庁の所有物であることをここに宣言します。しかし、プトン・IVとその人々がどうなるかを決めるのは自由開拓者です。審判は、いかがなさいますか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est à l'Ordo qu'il incombe de décider du sort de ses membres déchus. Je déclare que les archives hérétiques, les artefacts issus des fouilles et les autres éléments en la possession de Lichtenhart sont la propriété de la Sainte Inquisition. Cependant, c'est {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de décider ce qu'il adviendra de Phton-IV et de ses habitants. Quel est votre verdict ? »
languages.original_text: "The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est à l'Ordo qu'il incombe de décider du sort de ses membres déchus. Je déclare que les archives hérétiques, les artefacts issus des fouilles et les autres éléments en la possession de Lichtenhart sont la propriété de la Sainte Inquisition. Cependant, c'est {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de décider ce qu'il adviendra de Phton-IV et de ses habitants. Quel est votre verdict ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das Schicksal ihrer gefallenen Mitglieder ist Sache der Ordos. Ketzerische Archive, Artefakte von der Ausgrabung und andere Posten in Lichtenharts Besitz erkläre ich hiermit zum Eigentum der Heiligen Inquisition. Allerdings muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} entscheiden, was mit Phton IV und seinen Bewohnern geschehen soll. Wie lautet Euer Urteil?"
languages.original_text: "The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Schicksal ihrer gefallenen Mitglieder ist Sache der Ordos. Ketzerische Archive, Artefakte von der Ausgrabung und andere Posten in Lichtenharts Besitz erkläre ich hiermit zum Eigentum der Heiligen Inquisition. Allerdings muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} entscheiden, was mit Phton IV und seinen Bewohnern geschehen soll. Wie lautet Euer Urteil?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Günahkâr mensuplara ne olacağına Nizam karar verir. Kâfirce arşivler, kazıda elde edilen eserler ve Lichtenhart'ın elinde bulundurduğu diğer varlıkların bundan böyle Kutsal Engizisyon'un malı olduğunu ilan ediyorum. Phton IV'e ve gezegen halkına ne olacağına karar verecek olan ise Hür Tacir'dir. Kararın nedir?"
languages.original_text: "The fate of its fallen members is a matter for the Ordo. Heretical archives, artefacts obtained in the excavation and other assets in Lichtenhart's possession I hereby declare the property of the Holy Inquisition. However, it is for the Rogue Trader to decide what becomes of Phton IV and its people. What is your verdict?"

traits.locale_text: "Günahkâr üyelerine ne olacağı bir Nizam meselesidir. Kâfirce arşivler, kazıda elde edilen eserler ve Lichtenhart'ın elinde bulundurduğu diğer şeylerin bundan böyle Kutsal Engizisyon'un malı olduğunu ilan ediyorum. Ancak Phton IV'e ve gezegenin halkına ne olacağına karar verecek olan Hür Tacir'dir. Kararın nedir?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
